other_tests.findings: Pathological biopsy revealed multiple metastatic tissues in the penis; immunohistochemistry confirmed rectal metastasis. Tumor cells were positive for CDX-2, Villin, CK20, and the Ki-67 index reached up to 50%; negative for TTF-1 and CK7.
Genetic tests indicated sensitivity to Bevacizumab.
Incision and drainage of hip and left thigh lateral root abscesses were performed.
